wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Dave, great question! The trkciy thing about borders is that your borders will be drawn OUTSIDE of your corner images. To fix this, just change the positioning values of the corner images (i.e. top: 0; left: 0; ) to -1px instead of 0 (i.e. top: -1px; left: -1px; ), where 1px is the same width as your border effect. This bumps your corners out 1 pixel in order to cover up the border.Posted by on June 5, 2009 at 8:58 am.

This is a great technique with a small foiorptnt, but is ineffective when the containers of the rounded boxes have non-flat background colours/images. Example: if the background is a gradient or an image the above technique will not work. If you change the corner image to a transparent gif, the background colour of the cornerBox holder will fill all the corners transparency, thus destroying the rounded box look. For most other situations, this is a pretty good solution.Posted by on May 19, 2009 at 10:59 am.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: cristi
item.content:encoded:
[clear] [header]Who are we?[/header] [subheader]The force is strong with this one[/subheader] [one_half]I need your help, Luke. She needs your help. I'm getting too old for this sort of thing. You mean it controls your actions? Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess. I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money. Leave that to me. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master.[/one_half] [one_half]I have traced the Rebel spies to her. Now she is my only link to finding their secret base. Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan. I've got to go home. It's late, I'm in for it as it is. Escape is not his plan. I must face him, alone. I'm trying not to, kid. Dantooine. They're on Dantooine.[/one_half] [clear] [one_half] [skills skill1="Photoshop" skill2="Illustrator" skill3="HTML5" skill4="CSS3" skill5="JavaScript" skill6="WordPress"][/one_half] [one_half]
Testimonials
[testimonial]The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force.[/testimonial] [testimonial]I'm surprised you had the courage to take the responsibility yourself.[/testimonial] [testimonial]The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force.[/testimonial] [testimonial]Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him.[/testimonial] [/one_half]

Un Tauro suele ser prctico, decidido y tener una gran fuerza de voluntad. Los tauro son personas estables y conservadores, y seguirn de forma leal un lder en el que tienen confianza. Les encanta la paz y tranquilidad y son muy respetuosos con las leyes y las reglas. Respetan los valores materiales y evitan las deudas. Son un poco reacios al cambio.

Son ms prcticos que intelectuales, y como les gusta la continuidad y la rutina, suelen ser de ideas fijas. Los Tauro son prudentes, estables y tienen un gran sentido de la justicia. No suelen hundirse ante las dificultades sino que siguen adelante hasta salir.
At last, smoeone who comes to the heart of it all
This makes everything so completely pnialess.
